data.title: The Curious Task
data.text:
Meet our host, Alex Aragona!

Alex Aragona is a producer and the host of The Curious Task podcast. His writing has been published by The Center for a Stateless Society and Adam Smith Works, and he also founded and contributes to Speaking Liberally — a website that publishes thoughts, opinions, and articles rooted in exploring and defending liberal principles.

His mix of intellectual influences includes Thomas Paine, J.S. Mill, Adam Smith, Milton Friedman, and Noam Chomsky.

When he’s not podcasting, writing, or reading, he’s enjoying his time as a marketing communications specialist and a managing partner at a marketing agency.

Alex holds an Honours Bachelor of Business Administration from Nipissing University.
